title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Cook pasta in salted boiling water until al dente.
Beat eggs and mix with cheese.
Combine hot pasta with pancetta and remove from heat, then stir in egg-cheese mixture.
Serve with extra cheese and black pepper.
